title: Nfbc Animation Collection No 1
brief_description: Lady Fishbourne’s Complete Guide To Better Table Manners (1976, 5 min.): A humorous film illustrating the curious etiquette of Lady Fishbourne. “E” (1981, 6 min.): A political satire about how a dictator imposes his delusions on society. “The Men in the Park” (1971, 6 min.): A study in black pencil animation. “Balablok” (1972, 6 min.): A human comedy about man’s propensity to use violence. “Beginnings” (1980,8min):A view of the universe. “Cosmic Zoom” (1968,8min): Shows the magnitude of space, and minuteness of matter. “Blowhard” (1978,9min): The business venture, Consolidated Oragons. “The Energy Carol” (1975,10min): The basics of energy. “Getting Started” (1977,12min): Distractions delay the pianist. “The Sand Castle” (1977,13min) - Sculptures from the sand.
